website_summaries.verdict: A rugged, large trailer that can haul a lot for a decent price.
pros: Has a solid metal bottom, with a removable and washable cover
Trailer weighs 39 pounds and can hold up to 176 pounds
cons: Some felt that that this option is a little on the heavy side
Some durability issues with the axles and tires
Metal bottom makes quite a racket when you drag it around empty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fit together except wheels as snap ring tool ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fit together except wheels as snap ring tool did not fit right. Used an after market snap ring plier I happened to have already. I would reccomend they find a better way to mount rims. Other than that everything went together well. It needs a little more reflective trim I think as it has no relectors on the rear. I just put two clip on relector/ flashers. Heavier than expected! Must weigh 28 punds, but not a nock as it is sturdy so for $100 you get a deal!
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice trailer
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this bike trailer. Had it together in 10 minutes. Carried my beer cooler, 3 chairs, and a blanket. Took it to the concert in the park. The trailer pulls well, it’s got a little weight to it but sterdy. I received a lot of compliments on it. The only con I have was the tires. I recommend buying some better tires. I just got some 20in x 1.75 BMX tires for it way better. I looked for weeks and decided on this one. Now let’s see though how long it last. But again I do recommend this trailer. Exspecially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Fits a a ton. Cover needs hacking. Came bent.
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I have nothing to compare it to. I can fit about a weeks worth of groceries for a family of four vegans (lots of bulky produce). Tip: thread the cover’s corner through the metal latch on at least two sides; and use Velcro straps for the other two sides. That way if it lifts while riding it won’t blow away. Oh, and it came with a bent pole but my husband was able to force it to work using brute strength. If I’d had to do it myself I probably would have just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Schmitty

customer_reviews.title: Good trailer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This trailer is very awesome. Looks good, lightweight with a tough bottom. If I had a concern it would be that Velcro holds the material on rather than snap buttons. I installed my own with a cheap kit from my local hobby store. I also installed tent pole to run horizontally between the wheels and the material because the wheels WILL rub a hole in the material if you want to haul anything. Very easy to fix these little design flaws. For the price I guess I can't complain too much. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy cheesy to put together. I did put thorn resistant tube in because of the thorns where we live but other than that, it’s a great value. I also lined it with carpet and added a sunbrella for my pooch. Tows great with Charlie who is a 70 lbs Goldendoodle. You can tell when she moves around but it is very stable. Would definitely recommend. We have several hundred miles already and I expect many more.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate packaging?  Or something else?
customer_reviews.text: The cart quality is about what one would expect, for the price. The packaging was either inadequate, or something exceptional happened in shipping, either from factory to warehouse. or from warehouse to me. One of the tube ends, for one tube-to-tube connection, was flattened. Using my tools I was able to reshape the tube ends so that I could connect the two. Finish comprised; cart usable. Not very happy, but not returning cart. The assembly instructions are among the worst of any that I have ever seen. I would have completed assembly more rapidly WITHOUT the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Hollimon

customer_reviews.title: Aosom Elite trailer is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This trailer is absolutely the best buy for a cargo trailer. The capacity of 180 lbs is real. I regularly use it to go to Costco and get cases of water and groceries. Most of my loads are in the 120 -150 lb range. The trailer tows very nicely under load and the hitch seems to cushion some of the bumps/dips in the road. I am looking to have a bike lock loop welded to the frame as the trailer can be disassembled easily.
customer_reviews.author: C-Note

customer_reviews.title: Love it - purchased to use as a pet trailer
customer_reviews.text: Love it - purchased to use as a pet trailer, perfect size for my 50lb dog. It is easy to attach/detach from bike, fits into the back of my car without folding (folds down easily if you have a smaller vehicle), and pulls nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Hill

customer_reviews.title: Trash! Spend your money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this trailer! I’ve had mine for just over one month, I use it every weekend. I took it to the store yesterday, and on the way home the axel came loose. Now the tire is wobbly, and it is only a matter of time before the axel breaks altogether. this morning I decide to see if I can get a replacement part, but there is no place to buy replacement parts. Multiple forms confirm that Aosom do not sell, or even have replacement part available. The only recourse is to buy yet another of their trailers, or maybe find a used one to scavenge for parts.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Got this, put it together in 10 minutes, and inflated the tires. Now trying to figure out an intelligent jig to install on my NanRobot scooter which utilizes the thoughtfully conceived quick-disconnect yolk on the wagon. While creating a work-horse platform for my scooter, be advised that this thing isn’t light, BUT, has a slight “down” angle in the design of the tongue which will improve stability at speed ( helped by the coil spring on the yolk), when traveling at speed.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs better instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to putting this together after purchasing it a few months ago. You should be aware that there are only some poorly printed instructions for assembling the wheels and no other instructions included in the box. It was hard to figure out the wheels from the very fuzzy black and white photos, but I figured everything out and it went together rather easily. The trailer is of reasonably good quality and held up to a two mile grocery run very well. For the price, this is a very good option for a bicycle cargo trailer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Apple

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble good quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy easy asambly seems to be vary good quality and will be useful for many things I can't wait till it stops raining to try it out!!!! The only reason I changed my review to 4 star's is they don't offer replacement parts that means when it's out of warranty you are out of luck I bike all over the place and if I need a spare part I'm in trubble!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: He said it was the best gift he has ever received
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday. He said it was the best gift he has ever received. He runs a food truck and uses the trailer to bike the dishes to and from the truck. He can fit 2 regular sized bus tubs in there. We've picked up groceries and mulch and packed picnics! This trailer is a game changer. As some of the other reviews stated, the tires aren't the best, but so far (3months) we haven't had any issues with them. Very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price I paid
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive trailer and found this. My only complaint is with the hitch. When the trailer is straight behind the bike the spring is bent at a 45 degree angle. When you make a left turn the spring is bent at more than a 90 degree angle. Also the part of the hitch that stays on the bike shifts with a heavy load and bends the spring further. I don't know how long the spring will last as I have only used it twice and the most weight I have pulled is about 20-30lbs. I only use this when I need to carry bulky item that will on fit in my panniers.
customer_reviews.author: MTBrider

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer
customer_reviews.text: This is bike trailer is exactly as it should be. Affordable, easy to assemble and (so far) hearty. I purchased it to tow my inflatable stand up paddle board to the water a few miles from my house. All of my gear fits perfectly and I don’t feel like I am towing a ton of weight. I have not filled it with anything particularly heavy yet, but the trailer a does well and I imagine that it will continue even with a weighty load. I am stoked.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra erb

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at Burning Man.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Burning man for my beer cart. It worked like a champ hauling my 5 gallon homebrew kegs around and hasn't had any major issues. I went thru about 5 of the 7 kegs I brought giving out beer to everyone out in the desert. I may customize to make it more mad max style, but it works great for what it is and wasn't terribly hard to pedal around with. Gears might make it much easier than a cruiser bike though.
customer_reviews.author: rideincircles

customer_reviews.title: A good, low-cost alternative for hauling gear.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, inexpensive alternative to a lot of other trailers out there. I needed something to carry a cooler or fishing supplies on bike rides. This thing fits the bill. It's not the lightest as its steel vs. aluminum, but it seems strong/durable. I've had no issues with a loaded cooler, lawn chairs, fishing supplies, and other misc. gear. I did upgrade the tires to some Continentals as the stock tires were of the cheaper variety.
customer_reviews.author: Dipstix585

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this trailer for a few months, but so far I have used for everything from grocery runs, camping trips and transporting a (partially full) keg of beer across town when there were no sober drivers around. It was easy to put together. I only had to look at the instructions once to see how to use the provided hardware to attach the axels to the wheels. Don't listen to the people who say this is hard to assemble. I have taken this trailer on a 60 and 110 mile weekend camping trips on sometimes rough (for a road bike) trails without issue. I would not recommend this for serious touring though. Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: julian_irwin

customer_reviews.title: New item, not at all new. Like new at best.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, very functional, solid... unfortunately my “new” trailer is “like new” at best. There are small tears and frays in the fabric. There are visible dents and scratches in the paper thin sheet metal bed, not possibly from shipping. Cosmetic damage almost entirely, still undoubtedly not new! Cover leaves something to be desired. Nothing properly attaches it to the trailer but elastic surround. The product is solid for the price, the 3 star was a reflection of the poor integrity of the company that would pawn off a used item as new. That’s just stank!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They won’t sell replacement parts. Otherwise a good trailer.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this trailer overall. The one complaint I have is that the hitch part where the apron is broke and they will not sell a replacement part. So no I’m supposed to spend $140 to get a working trailer? Not good!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trailer almost 5 months ago. In that time I've used it to pull my dog into town (about 10 miles round trip) once or twice a week, get groceries or use it as a "trunk" for my bike, and it was used to pull a "float" during a Fourth of July parade. It is awesome. I get tons of compliments and the thing works great. My only minor complaint is that the tires really took a hit. They are cheap and so bald at this point that I'm afraid they will wear right through (new ones on order). If you're looking for a solid little trailer, for the price, you absolutely cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay B.

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice cargo wagon. It didn’t work for me because if size but I wish it had. It is very well made. Like the ease of folding it up. And it fit perfectly in the back of my Honda Fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my whole messy garage and made several trips with loads of garbage on my trailer and each trip the trailer did the job quite well. I even lugged a heavy removable car back seat on it and it handled it quite well. Will buy again in future
customer_reviews.author: 2MARKO

customer_reviews.title: great product...
customer_reviews.text: this is my 3rd. trailer, i gave one to a friend...i am very satisfied with this product and the company has gone behond the call of duty to satisfy me....... I am extremely happy, this is the only trailer that can take such heavy load... thank you Aosom from Brooklyn N.Y.
customer_reviews.author: michelbayard

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses.  Grocery getter to lawn mower hauler.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and easy to modify. My son uses it to tow his push mower from job to job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Craw

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged. I think it was a return ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged. I think it was a return. Box opened. Pipe was bent so I can’t get side render on. Chipped paint.....
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kumfert

customer_reviews.title: Tires Leak
customer_reviews.text: My Dogs love riding in the back but I noticed that within a few weeks both tires leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. One of the bars was a little warped so I had to hammer it into place, but the assembly and breakdown is very friendly and quick. The Tires are a bit wobbly but otherwise I think it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Greenlee

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to attach to my bike. A little difficult to attach by myself. Ended up converting it to a dog cart. Had a friend weld bars to each side...worked beautifully
customer_reviews.author: WildVineKC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, careful with wheel assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use around my home town and save some gas money this summer. Works great for getting groceries. I hardly even know I’m pulling a trailer while biking even with a load in it. Only downfall is that the clips for the wheel assembly are very fragile. They send extras but only one didn’t break on me. Just be very careful with them or have a backup plan in case they break.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to assemble, and disassemble for transport. I'm totally amazed at how week thought out this is and the capacity as well as the durability. Got to me a week early and together in 15 minutes. Wheels come off and it folds up in about one minute.
customer_reviews.author: TinkermanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: All great except wobbely wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Great trailer except for the wheels. They wobble a little and I have used the extra spacers but then you cannot get the retainer clip on the axle. Otherwise it fits my sons 21 inch self propelled Craftsmen mower, weed eater, 2 fuel cans, and bucket. All stacked on the mower but holds it great.
customer_reviews.author: Logans Tow & Mow

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the trailer to use during our weeklong stay in Nantucket. It proved very useful and durable allowing us to tow luggage and all our beach supplies for the week. It even survived a minor accident I had as I clipped a curb too closely. I highly recommend the item. It is super easy to put on and off the bike and disassembles easily as well. My only recommendation is to improve the assembly insrtictions - they are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L. Elrefai

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Really like the quality of the Aosom elite trailer compared to others I've seen. A friend has had a Aosom trailer, for quite sometime. Tested tuff
customer_reviews.author: Robert Greene

customer_reviews.title: Its worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I think I went a little over the limit but it held up nice product. Like I said it's worth every penny would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: You can't even feel it when pulling because it rolls so smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wagon except for one thing. No directions to be found anywhere on exactly how the wagon connects to the bike and the way the connection is on the wagon arm is impossible for me to figure out. Jeffrey Hopkins
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for carrying heavy loads
customer_reviews.text: I use this for bike touring and camping. Very useful for carrying heavy loads. After several long trips, this unit has been trouble free.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Well worth paying and extra $10-15 for better quality
customer_reviews.text: Moe sturdy that one returned earlier. Parts went together we'll except sprap ring for axle. Instructions lacking here. Tool to put on included which is a great plus. Nice entry level cart.
customer_reviews.author: 57chevy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Only one problem was part of it was bent and was really hard to get the outer bar to attach. Looks great and easy to move around. Update: just noticed one of the tires is flat
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: It's a steady trailer and holds a lot of fishing gear.
customer_reviews.text: The box came FedEx with a gouge in it. I unboxed it 2 days later and discovered that it had a tear in the cover. It was on a seam so I fixed it the best I could.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Arbeene

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: As other commenters have pointed out there are small gaps in the corners where small items could fall out on you. I don't mind that so I'm not reducing a star because the side are still plenty strong to contain my stuff. The solid metal bottom is great and this thing rides so smoothly behind you don't even notice it until you hit a hill. Hills are obviously hard because no matter how good this is it's going to take extra effort to lift weight up hill.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dilger

customer_reviews.title: Not bad needs reflectors on rear
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with cover at least mine didn't. Tires continually go flat from the start. Holds up well to loads pulls good. But needs rear reflectors or a light.
customer_reviews.author: Pweikel

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Just got the trailer. I had an issue with a missing manual which was solved in less than 24h by the support. They took care of my concern a Sunday and it is appreciated. The trailer itself looks good and well built. It is foldable in the sense that you can easily remove the wheels and fold the cart, then store them together
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Overall works but needed to be modified
customer_reviews.text: My true issue is I had to file the arm to make it fit over the bolt of my bike to use the trailer. I imagine though that this trailer is designed for all major builds but my bike is a bit on the low end of design. Overall once I was able to use the trailer it's amazing to gather grocerys in, this is important since I do not have a car.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jones

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: Light, sturdy but sides are cloth. Cover is worthless. Overall, like the product and use it to trace to the beach, but WILL NOT ROLL ON BEACH SAND.
customer_reviews.author: Kentjax

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is just cool. Works well, satisfied with the quality but kinda tricky to set up first time, but once you know how to do it, it is pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wigglebottoms

customer_reviews.title: Get your own split ring pliers
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are quite incomplete. There seem to be leftover washers, split rings and the spring tabs that the side bars snap into. The snap ring pliers that came in the bag of parts is worthless: the pins are conical and too large. The rings would not stay on the pliers. Good thing I had a pair of $5 pliers from Harbor Freight.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Blaskey

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this in February 2017 and it broke shortly ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this in February 2017 and it broke shortly thereafter and Aosom has failed to remedy the situation. The axles are weak.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alderman

customer_reviews.title: Use with my electric bicycle for grocery shopping it’s perfect. Extremely well-built.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with my electric bicycle use it for grocery shopping it’s perfect. Extremely well-built.
customer_reviews.author: Gale w Myers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great trailer. I put my 90lb dog in it and ride at 20 mph no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan

customer_reviews.title: great cargo trailer
customer_reviews.text: tracks well, does not tip easily on turns, holds a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.author: Donna Nutter

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: This trailer is awesome for the price. I love that the walls & tow hitch bar fold away for easy storage. It can handle speeds of up to 18mph(I've tested)& still float smooth. The only bad thing I can say is where the hitch bar connects to trailer feels a little wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Good strong trailer however I received it with damaged cut ...
customer_reviews.text: Good strong trailer however I received it with damaged cut material and five screws missing,,, however the seller insults me by wanting pictures,,, I couldn't be bothered so I just repaired it myself
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Good trailer
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble putting this together because the custom tool that came with it didn't fit right. I had to file it down repeatedly until I could get it to work. The company gave me a 30% refund, after I wrote them about it. Otherwisen the product works great once I got it together.
customer_reviews.author: Greggory Johnson

customer_reviews.title: built strong....a zoomer
customer_reviews.text: loaded this up with 3 ... 35 ah 12 volt batteries to power my 36 volt 800 watt front wheel drive battery powered bike wheel....all bought here...from amazon...runs great..estimated travel distance....35 to 40 miles......any volunteers?
customer_reviews.author: D. Glover

customer_reviews.title: I have an E bike and it’s still pretty heavy
customer_reviews.text: Wheels are pretty cheap but can work out really well good bang for your buck pretty heavy though to pull behind a bike
customer_reviews.author: Codean Codi

customer_reviews.title: Made in China, dance with the devil.
customer_reviews.text: The guard rails did not fit! now I am forced to use the trailer without them attached.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Carson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cargo.
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST. I love my bike cargo. I do not have a car and I am able to put 2 weeks worth of groceries in this. I would recommend this to anyone. Also I get complements on how cool it is.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: So far it holds my art supplies great! The tires are a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: So far it holds my art supplies great! The tires are a little flimsy. May have to change out.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer!
customer_reviews.text: Been using daily to transport tools to & from work. Absolutely great trailer! Can hold a load heavy enough that you don't want to pull.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blare

customer_reviews.title: Solid, useful, easy.
customer_reviews.text: The directions are difficult but with some careful analysis you'll be fine, the trailer itself has a great capacity, much larger than it looks, and maneuverability is fine, unless you're backing up. All in all very glad I purchased it
customer_reviews.author: Emilio P

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have onr
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, outstanding quality, easy assembly. Seems to be exactly what they advertised.. I had an Instep,and would never speak badly about them, but for the money, this is the way to go.,..
customer_reviews.author: Kim D Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for all necessities for that bike ride to the park.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I have so much room to carry so much stuff. Bucket of baseballs, baseball/ soccer net and a small ice chest.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little trailer
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little trailer. I use it to transport a lawnmower I share with a friend. 4 stars because the instructions are pretty awful. Took me a bit to figure out how to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, great size. Super for hauling gear into the backwoods for a week of fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Loghaven 2

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great trailer for the price. Had to modify the bottom of the trailer so that as you go over bumps when it's empty it doesn't pop and rattle. Easy modification.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, didn't like the quality of materials. Cheap rubber, cheap wheels, doesn't worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Rami

customer_reviews.title: Pull behind bike trailer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, folds down for easy hauling, would prefer straight tongue over bent one.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: a great cart at a good price with a cover
customer_reviews.text: a great cart at a good price with a cover, it was a little hard installing the wheels. be sure to lock it up while you are in the store though. a lot of folks will want one of these. save gas and use a bike.
customer_reviews.author: verdie

customer_reviews.title: needs psi guage
customer_reviews.text: 4#s of air is what the wheels require; however, there isn't a Guage small enough to read 4#s and the trailer does not come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Collins

customer_reviews.title: Cool little trailer
customer_reviews.text: Love this cool little trailer. We take it camping so we can tote along our beach supplies, fishing equipment, coolers, and our dog.. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Bestwick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Trailer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father to pull along behind his three wheel electric scooter. It works perfectly and has allowed him to be more self sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forgets important parts
customer_reviews.text: Product sucks they sent me a 30 lbs paper weight. Missing a major part. The rubber that goes in the right axe of the cart. It's there to hold the wheel axe on snugly. So without it it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Aosom Cart great for bike riders
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart for my dad to use for his grocery shopping, He love the size of the cart also its waterproof cover id a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles1972

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected, a major plus. Easily assembled with only one tool needed (and thoughtfully provided by Aosom.) Lightweight and centers behind the bicycle nicely. Looks great. Will update the review after it has been put through its paces.
customer_reviews.author: Winchester95

customer_reviews.title: Well made and nice size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size cargo trailer for my bike. I cut to size a rubber yoga mat and placed on the metal floor to keep items from shifting and from scratching the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go grocery shopping. Never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: James  Brannen

customer_reviews.title: Aosome elite 2 cargo trailor
customer_reviews.text: A nice cargo trailor for bikes. But rattle alot and some what difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better construction than I was expecting. Have hooked behind a road master(great peak) Wal-mart special.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeecup

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money .
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected on the frame and canvas. The only "con" is the wheels and bearings. They really went cheap here. I will definately replace them by the end of summer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together , never needed my own tools. just snapped together and went riding. Loaded Cooler beach chairs and towels and off to the beach we went. Excellent trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replace the lift pin with a sturdy bolt and ride on!
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this a 5 but the lift pin broke on the first outing and the back panel was totally torn up. I repaired the panel and put in a bolt instead of the pin and haven't had any problems since. The ride is smooth and I don't even notice it behind my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Its allright.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this trailer. The rims were a little bent but it was expected from china. Hit 1 bump too hard I guess now a rim has a flat spot also. Its loud. The cargo area and bike hookup and red stripe cover don't blow off its nice. This beats my homemade pvc bike trailer tho.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while back... I hauled everything with this. even hauled 375 pounds of cast iron antique radiator heaters... exceeded my expectations.... very smooth behind my bike..... not very heavy and very rugged.....
customer_reviews.author: Jonathen

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Item received was black and not silver ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Item received was black and not silver as seen in picture. Slight damage in shipment. Was able to fix with having part being replaced. Small tear in rear canvas. Aosom customer service very responsive in resolving problem. Using trailer for hauling things to the beach and shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan I

customer_reviews.title: I do not understand peoples complaints
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with an axle and a bent rim called customer support and they addressed the issue right away.Companies need to take lessons about what customer service is all about
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This trailer is amazing, I like that both my Mountain bike and ...
customer_reviews.text: This trailer is amazing, I like that both my Mountain bike and minibike can pull it. It has great cargo space, and folds up for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Floyd

customer_reviews.title: just great
customer_reviews.text: Just had for a couple days its very big, bigger than I thought it would be. Made some big grocery runs and all those times it performed its job. Easily this is the best trailer I've had very nice. Oh and it got here alot sooner than promised 5 stars indeed
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL

customer_reviews.title: Pulled great only draw back is soft sides buldge if over ...
customer_reviews.text: Did 250 miles with over 100 pnds. Pulled great only draw back is soft sides buldge if over stuffed.
customer_reviews.author: john raymond

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied. A few of my friends bought the same
customer_reviews.text: I use it almost every day. (2 month). I am very satisfied. A few of my friends bought the same. I recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vadim

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer
customer_reviews.text: Great for bringing beach chairs and bags to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Little Trailer
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I need it to do, pulls nice, can put alot of groceries, fishing/ picnic supplies in it! Easy to fold down or unfold. Use a lock as a pin connecting to bike, added a rubber mat on floor for less movement of cargo instead of metal floor which is easy for things to slide. Cover is very nice, but seems to want blow off in windy days, use small bungie straps on each corner which solved problem. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good Value needs more instruction.
customer_reviews.text: I would almost give a 5 but one of the bolts was misformed and hard to work. The instructions were a joke for those of us tech challenged. Maybe a youtube video? Velcro does not seem sturdy and would of liked a reflector on the back (but i knew it didn't have one so i can not fault for that). I got this for my scooter so unfortuntaly it sits up too high. They said you could use it for a motorcycle i don't understand where it would attach. It looks as if items could slip out of the corners but i got some black duct tape for this problem. Also no bolt and nut to attach to the scooter/bike.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Sain

customer_reviews.title: arrived on time and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Well made. , arrived on time and great customer service . Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Its very helpful but just in case people are looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Its very helpful but just in case people are looking for the tire size. its 20x1.95 also never ride it on hartford CT City streets.most of them don't know how to drive.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight T. Teal Jr

customer_reviews.title: Handles great!
customer_reviews.text: I took all 4 of my furkids out on a bike ride today. It performed well. I am happy. Unfortunately, it came ripped or I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: it's a trailer!
customer_reviews.text: holds a lot of weight, does what it was intended to do. haul stuff. i do groceries and laundry with this thing. the only difficult thing is that this design doesn't allow easy locking up.
customer_reviews.author: greenonions

customer_reviews.title: Nice big size for holding groceries.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, durable, costs way less than at other companies,nice red and black color,nice yellow wheel reflectors:( Two on each wheel), Me and my friends love it.Increases visibility and Holds 100 pounds of groceries.I will recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: David Lewis Lee Jr.

customer_reviews.title: pertty good!
customer_reviews.text: great cart, great quality. it's not water proof. install was a pain. it's not easy to take on and off quickly, requires tools. shipped SUPER quick.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Burkenbine

customer_reviews.title: It is much better that the one we previously used
customer_reviews.text: This is going to work perfectly to let our dog ride along on bike rides. It is much better that the one we previously used!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Aosom Elite Two-Wheel Bicycle Large Cargo Wagon Trailer with Oxford Fabric, Folding Storage, Removable Cover, Red
feature_bullets: ✅DURABLE TRAILER BASE: The convenient Oxford cloth basket of this bike trailer is set atop a solid metal base that can hold up to 88 lbs.
✅QUICK SIMPLE FOLD DOWN: This cargo trailer features quick release wheels and a simple fold down so that storage is easy and convenient when not in use.
✅PERFECT FOR CARGO: This bike cart for cargo is ideal for running errands such as grocery shopping, toting supplies, or your daily commute.
✅REMOVABLE COVER: A removable cover is included on this cargo wagon to help keep items covered and secured when riding.
✅EASY BIKE HITCH: One Aosom Type ‘A’ bike hitch and connector is included, which will quickly and easily attach this bike wagon to most bike frames.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
